jeus.security.resource
Class PrincipalImpl

java.lang.Object
  jeus.security.resource.PrincipalImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.security.Principal
Direct Known Subclasses:
GroupPrincipalImpl
public class PrincipalImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.security.Principal, java.io.Serializable

이 클래스는 java.security.Principal 인터페이스를 설치하고 user 이름에 대한 jeus.security.api.Subject을 생성하는데 사용된다

Example: 

 Principal principal = new PrincipalImpl("johan");
 Subject subject = new Subject();
 subject.getPrincipals().add(principal);

See Also:
